tracks.title: G-Eazy - Me Myself & I (HYTYD Remix)
tracks.description:
So so much to love about the Summer. Weather, festivals, clothes, general vibes, and of course the soul that makes all that go ’round: the music. Summer tunes are so fittingly warm and airy, and there’s few people out there that do them as well as HYTYD. His remix of James Bay’s “Let it Go” more than impressed us with its tasteful simplicity and grounded emotions, this time he’s in our spotlight thanks to a beach ready remix of G-Eazy’s radio hit, “Me Myself & I.” Beachside, poolside, in the car, in your room, in the office…I don’t care where you listen to it, this is bound to get you moving. Once again, his instrumental arrangement is clean and concise, and his vocal edits are sublime. While tropical house tends to bludgeon you over the head with the idea that it’s meant for the Summer, HYTYD’s light and lofty style implies it with the utmost maturity, leaving you to imagine it in any setting; we’re hoping to hear this baby all season long, and you make it a reality with the free download below. Enjoy.
- @EDMTUNES

HYTYD:
https://www.instagram.com/HYTYDmusic
https://www.twitter.com/HYTYDmusic
https://www.facebook.com/HYTYD
https://www.vine.co/HYTYD
https://www.youtube.com/HYTYDmusic

tracks.title: GAMPER & DADONI - Close To You (feat. Daniel Ahearn)
tracks.description:
DOWNLOAD / STREAM
https://fanlink.to/closetoyou

HEY GUYS!
So grateful we found Daniel Ahearn, a Singer based in Los Angeles, who wrote this song together with Rich Jacques. We discovered this track on Youtube and really loved everything about it. The lyrics are very intense and emotional. But (and this was most important for us) absolutely authentic. 

We took the vocals and built a whole new arrangement and instrumentation around them. We think this song is brilliant for thoughtful moments, but also while just chilling with your friends enjoying good music!

Please support us by sharing this track with your friends and/or put it into your playlists. But most of all, enjoy it! :)

G&D

Lyrics:
There’s a gentleness I’ve known,
Knew it best when it was fading,
Trying to find my way back home,
Don’t you know, there’s no escaping.

Because I wanted to be loved,
I just wanted to get close to you,
Because I wanted to be loved,
I lost everything I knew.

Turned away from all my dreams,
broken down disintegrating,
Ignored the signs of all deceit,
couldn’t believe - can you blame me?

Because I wanted to be loved,
I just wanted to get close to you,
Because I wanted to be loved,
I lost everything I knew.

Didn’t see until it all was done,
Felt so right to hold someone,
what i saw in you was almost true,
brutal what the heart will do…

Because I wanted to be loved,
I just wanted to get close to you,
Because I wanted to be loved,
I lost everything I knew.

Credits:

Gamper & Dadoni:
www.facebook.com/gamperanddadoni
www.soundcloud.com/gamperdadoni
www.instagram.com/gamperdadoni

Daniel Ahearn:
www.facebook.com/danielahearnmusic
www.soundcloud.com/danielahearnmusic
www.instagram.com/danielahearnmusic

tracks.title: Frank Walker - Run With The Real Feat. DAVS (Original Mix)
tracks.description:
Run With The Real.

Hot off of the success of his most recent single, ‘Toes’, Frank Walker is back with another massive summer release.  Frank’s latest release, ‘Run With The Real’, features the amazing vocals of LA-based artist DAVS.  With this latest single, Walker is taking a departure from his traditional house style, experimenting with down-tempo vibes, and crafting a new frontier for his sound. 

‘Run with The Real’ is a grouping of sensual and uplifting melodies that will be hitting the dance floor at the peak of summer.  DAVS has delivered a masterful vocal performance, mixing her sweet vocal performance with edgy lyrics that are sure to turn heads. After listening to such an intoxicating combination, all can agree that with Walker’s powerful production, alongside the amazing vocals of DAVS, ‘Run with The Real’ is guaranteed to be a summer hit.

Follow Frank Walker to stay up to date on future releases:

@frankwalkerofficial
www.facebook.com/DJFrankWalker
www.twitter.com/DJFrankWalker

tracks.title: Au5 feat Q'AILA - Hit Rewind
tracks.description:
Hit Rewind is a relaxed but engaging departure from the dub-centric opener. Glistening, bubble like synths start the tune, and then it settles into a bouncing, intricate drum shuffle that drives a bright, addictive melody. All the layers and textures are all pulled together by a syncopated, buttery-smooth bass line, which expertly compliments Q‘Aila’s unapologetically sultry, soulful vocal lines.

tracks.description:
Download/Listen now: https://ARMAS1196.lnk.to/BYW

Coming forth with a record both distinctive and truly admiring, Shaan hits up Armada Music. ‘Break Your Ways’ stands out like few tracks can, as the young Indian talent threw all genre limitations overboard to come up with this spellbinding cut. From its untraditional rhythms to the spectacular choice of instruments and its unique vocal tones, ‘Break Your Ways’ is in a league of its own.

tracks.title: Automagic by Televisor
tracks.description: Like the track? Click the repost button Join the movement @ http://EDM.com Easily one of our favorite Nu Disco acts, and far-and-away one of the most promising artists in the genre, Televisor was the very first artist we ever posted on Nu_Disco, and you'll be seeing a lot more of him as the Network continues to grow. An incredibly gifted composer with a penchant for groovy, funky beats and a knack for extraordinary catchy melodies, Televisor is a shining star amongst the Monstercat Roster, and he is OH-SO VERY unique…a treat for the ears that has rightfully earned the name "Automagic". Purchase: http://btprt.dj/1b6UgtF  ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••   Follow Televisor: www.facebook.com/televisormusic twitter.com/televisormusic SC: https://soundcloud.com/televisormusic Follow Monstercat: www.monstercat.com www.facebook.com/monstercat www.twitter.com/monstercat youtube.com/monstercat Follow us now @Nu_Disco on SoundCloud  •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

tracks.title: A Blues Malfunktion
tracks.description:
A new track of the Malfunktionality Album Part One will be uploaded every couple a days! 
So be on the lookout!!!

'I had so much fun working on this, that I literally had no idea that it would turn out so great! This is the sound that I've been looking for for a long time now. An album was the only option I had, so many ideas were flowing through my mind that I had to put into one album!' 
The album is divided in two parts, the first part contains twelve bluesy jazzy dance floor funkers. The second part of the album is containing all the collaborations with amazing artists that will be released later this year.  

Tracklist:
1. A Blues Malfunktion
2. Sowieso Good
3. Fat Iced Tea
4. Euforia Fatigue
5. Plectrum
6. Fragile Funk Cat
7. Fatigued Blues May Intrigue Kangaroos
8. Ratakatat
9. Tone Hormones
10. Feisty Frappucino 
11. One Flute Over The Cuckoo's Nest
12. Déjà Vu

Temporary Art Design By Manuel Andrés Vélez
Label: Adapted Records
Release date: 24 of May

tracks.title: Do Right
tracks.description:
Free download 

The song tells the narrative of a woman who is complaining about her partner's apparent financial insolvency. She states that he was financially well off in 1922, but now has nothing. She claims it is because he wasted it on other women, and that these lovers will no longer show any interest in him now that he is poor. She claims that he tricked her into a relationship where all he has to offer her is "a drink of gin." She ends each verse asking why the man does not 'do right' by her, and then throws him out, insisting that he go earn a living in order to support her.

Get more freebies > https://www.facebook.com/klabmusic/app_220150904689418

tracks.title: Hard To Believe (Funkaholism EP)
tracks.description:
Yooooo00oo00oo!!!!!!
Hope you are doing good!
So who's ready for a free EP?!?!

It suddenly hit me that I never dropped a free EP and I think there is no better time than now to give one before starting the new year! 
And since I am veryyy close to 8000 people that follow me on soundcloud now, I think it's a great time to show some gratitude to all you awesome peoplesss out theree with a free Funk EP!!!

This is the first track of the EP, I never 'sample' anything, so I thought why not try that out once for fun. Hope you enjoy this free dl!! 

it will be available for free to download on the 11th of December :).

And the awesome artwork is made by Cyberelg!
Check him out; https://www.facebook.com/Cyberelg !!

Chuuuuuuuuuuurss

tracks.title: Thomas Vent - One Day Live Your Life
tracks.description:
Like the tracks? Click the [Repost] ↻ button!

Support: ► 
Beatport: http://www.beatport.com/release/one-day-live-your-life-ep/1452846

SUBSCRIBE: bit.ly/subscribetoadaptedrecords 

Follow Thomas Vent: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/djthomasvent1
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/thomasvent
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasVent

Follow Adapted Records: 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Adaptedrecords 
Youtube: bit.ly/subscribetoadaptedrecords 
Twitter: twitter.com/Adapted_Records 
Beatport: www.beatport.com/label/adapted-records/24915 
SoundCloud: soundcloud.com/adaptedrecords

After an insane release with his EP Modern Bluesman, Thomas Vent is back to sate your craving for bluesy glitch hop!  Always putting tons of soul into his releases, One Day Live Your Life is no exception.  Utilizing instruments like the harmonica, guitar and unbelievable bases, this producer from Poland is always a joy to listen to.

Kicking this EP off with Deep In Your Soul, the track is full of energy and will hit you right in the chest with bass.  New Orleans Style pushes Vent’s normal sound and heads a bit more into the future; complex, melodic and insane production set this track in a world of its own.  The title track gets back to the funk and will propel you to a party unlike anything you’ve ever experienced.  Make sure to grab this EP and join Thomas Vent in One Day Live Your Life.

● Facebook: http://facebook.com/Adaptedrecords
● SoundCloud: http://soundcloud.com/adapted-records
● Twitter: http://twitter.com/adapted_records
● Website: http://adaptedrecords.com
● Youtube: http://goo.gl/p46EN1

Cheshire Music's rise to prominence in 2015 only validates the hype from his "Funk On" and "Simply Lifted" EP's. There's no better tribute to celebrate his library and style than this eclectic 13-track compilation of remixes from his peers.

With a midtempo origin, there was plenty of room to improvise and each artist delivers a unique imprint. FarfetchD shines with one of his grittiest tunes ever, a magnificent rendition of "We'll Be There." Functionality goes awry with the bassy wobbles of Beat Fatigue, Staunch, Orphic, SpekrFreks, and SugarBeats. Accordingly, there is plenty of emerging talent on deck to put a churn in your stomach with face-melting edits from Minoru, Funkanomics, mat tha hat, DJ Wood, Squelch Music, One Hand Clap, and Synergy Sound.

tracks.title: K+lab, Stickybuds - Super Gravy ft Laughton Kora & Bailey Wiley
tracks.description:
Gramatik & Lowtemp present:

Super Gravy.

Official Music video here> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=An83j85rZSc&feature=youtu.be

Two heavyweights of the glitch hop scene, K+Lab and Stickybuds, join forces for a funk-filled release on Gramatik’s independent label Lowtemp. Featuring guest vocals from Laughton Kora and Bailey Wiley, the track they’ve cooked up is hotter than a fistful of chilies. With its irresistible horn hooks, banging drums and heavy bass, “Super Gravy” is a summer anthem in the making and everything one would expect from two top notch producers at the top of their game.
tracks.tag_list: lowtemp gramatik K+Lab stickybuds "laughton kora" "bailey wiley" "glitch hop" "funk banger" nzonair skope opiuo exmag nz

tracks.title: Defunk - Forever and Never ft. Marshall McGee [LostinSound.org Premiere]
tracks.description:
Download here: 
http://bit.ly/dfunkdfree

@defunk-music

Westwood is proud to present "Delights" - The new album from Canadian electronic producer, Defunk. With a constantly evolving taste for bass music, Delights pushes his sound into new territories as he combines his favorite elements of midtempo, glitch, and future bass music with old school funk, soul, and hiphop. The result is a sexy palette of funky rhythms, dirty drops, jazzy solos, and special guest appearances from featured vocalists and instrumentalists alike including the Ragga Twins, Sam Klass, Marshall McGee, the Raya Brass Band and more. Keep your sights on Defunk this year, as he teams up with Pretty Lights Music artists in Telluride, CO and opens for Big Gigantic and RL Grime at Red Rocks Amphitheater.

tracks.title: Whatcha Gonna Do (The Funk Hunters Remix)
tracks.description:
"Whatcha Gonna Do (The Funk Hunters Remix)"
by Fort Knox Five ft. Mustafa Akbar
FKX088 - Fort Knox Recordings
http://www.fortknoxfive.com

Buy it here:
https://fortknox.bandcamp.com/album/whatcha-gonna-do-ft-mustafa-akbar
http://www.junodownload.com/products/fort-knox-five-mustafa-whatcha-gonna-do/2950296-02/
https://pro.beatport.com/release/whatcha-gonna-do/1644999
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/whatcha-gonna-do-ep/id1056560465


Tracklisting:
1. Whatcha Gonna Do (The Funk Hunters Remix)
2. Whatcha Gonna Do (Father Funk Remix)
3. Whatcha Gonna Do (Original Mix)
4. Whatcha Gonna Do (The Funk Hunters Remix Instrumental)
5. Whatcha Gonna Do (Father Funk Remix Instrumental)
6. Whatcha Gonna Do (Instrumental Mix)

Fort Knox Five is proud to present their latest single, “Whatcha Gonna Do” featuring Mustafa Akbar with killer remixes by The Funk Hunters and Father Funk.  

Fort Knox Five’s longtime friends and brothers in funk, Vancouver-based The Funk Hunters have delivered one of the baddest floor-rocking remixes ever!  This track debuted in the Fractal Forest at the 2015 Shambhala Music Festival where it electrified the masses and brought the crowd to a fever pitch. The Funk Hunters have injected their signature sound into “Whatcha Gonna Do” with big drops, huge hooks, and enough glitch and disco to make you put your hands up!  This is a guaranteed banger full of West Coast synths and chunked out beats. Easy to see why this one is already a staple of The Funk Hunters amazing live sets.

The next “Whatcha Gonna Do” Remix is by Father Funk, the Leeds, UK based producer known for his clever remixes and smashing edits.  Father Funk’s remix begins with Rob Myers’ retro wah-wah guitar and Mustafa Akbar’s soulful party chants then quickly escalates into a wobbly, bass heavy, butt-shaking glitch-hop monster! Hold on tight as Father Funk breaks it down, takes it back to the original soul vibe and then finishes strong with a deep groove.

The original mix of “Whatcha Gonna Do” featuring Mustafa Akbar is a quintessential Fort Knox Five slice of retro disco funk – straight from the ’70s – infused with tight, electronic production. With its live horns, funky guitar riffs and Mustafa Akbar’s soulful hooks, Fort Knox Five has created an irresistible party anthem. DJs and radio stations alike have rallied behind “Whatcha Gonna Do”, making it one of the lead tracks from Fort Knox Five’s 2015 album Pressurize The Cabin.
tracks.tag_list: Funk Bass Glitch Remix "The Funk Hunters" "Fort Knox Five" "Mustafa Akbar"

spread love to everyone... .... thanks

tracks.title: Do Right
tracks.description:
Free download 

The song tells the narrative of a woman who is complaining about her partner's apparent financial insolvency. She states that he was financially well off in 1922, but now has nothing. She claims it is because he wasted it on other women, and that these lovers will no longer show any interest in him now that he is poor. She claims that he tricked her into a relationship where all he has to offer her is "a drink of gin." She ends each verse asking why the man does not 'do right' by her, and then throws him out, insisting that he go earn a living in order to support her.

tracks.title: Beat Fatigue - Quadrupel
tracks.description:
Like the set? Click the [Repost] ↻ button!

SUBSCRIBE: bit.ly/subscribetoadaptedrecords
 
Out Now:
Beatport: http://www.beatport.com/release/malfunktionality-part-two/1400811
Addictech: http://www.addictech.com/p/169614

Follow Beat Fatigue: 
● Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh4YxFATEnYPYyhg7z8TAQg
● Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Beat-Fatigue/603641212989426
● SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/beat-fatigue
● Twitter: https://twitter.com/BeatFatigue1

Follow Adapted Records
● Facebook: http://facebook.com/Adaptedrecords
● SoundCloud: http://soundcloud.com/adapted-records
● Twitter: http://twitter.com/adapted_records
● Website: http://adaptedrecords.com
● Youtube: http://goo.gl/p46EN1

Beat Fatigue is back again with another unbelievable release. A regular on Adapted Records, this twenty-five year old from Amsterdam is becoming one of the most recognized producers in Glitch Hop. Combining his stunning ability to tear up a six string and his clean electronic production, this album is dripping with delicious funky vibes. nnMalfunktionality Part Two features sixteen tracks of Glitched out perfection. Not only is there the classic feeling of Beat Fatigue that we have grown to know and love, there are a few tracks that venture into new territory. Teaming up with some amazing artists, there are four MC’s that lay down some sick bars for the release. Also in collaboration is another Adapted favorite, Cheshire, for the track Biff Tannen. There is more to this release than we can some up in one paragraph, experience this outrageous album for yourself today!
tracks.tag_list: Beat Fatigue Glitch Hop midtempo hiphop bass music Opiuo Kill Paris Pretty Lights Gramatik Koan Sound Skrillex Culprate Au5 Cheshire Fractal Stickybuds 2014 Adaptedrecords Adapted

tracks.title: Thomas Vent - One Day Live Your Life
tracks.description:
Like the tracks? Click the [Repost] ↻ button!

Support: ► 
Beatport: http://www.beatport.com/release/one-day-live-your-life-ep/1452846

SUBSCRIBE: bit.ly/subscribetoadaptedrecords 

Follow Thomas Vent: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/djthomasvent1
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/thomasvent
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasVent

Follow Adapted Records: 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Adaptedrecords 
Youtube: bit.ly/subscribetoadaptedrecords 
Twitter: twitter.com/Adapted_Records 
Beatport: www.beatport.com/label/adapted-records/24915 
SoundCloud: soundcloud.com/adaptedrecords

After an insane release with his EP Modern Bluesman, Thomas Vent is back to sate your craving for bluesy glitch hop!  Always putting tons of soul into his releases, One Day Live Your Life is no exception.  Utilizing instruments like the harmonica, guitar and unbelievable bases, this producer from Poland is always a joy to listen to.

Kicking this EP off with Deep In Your Soul, the track is full of energy and will hit you right in the chest with bass.  New Orleans Style pushes Vent’s normal sound and heads a bit more into the future; complex, melodic and insane production set this track in a world of its own.  The title track gets back to the funk and will propel you to a party unlike anything you’ve ever experienced.  Make sure to grab this EP and join Thomas Vent in One Day Live Your Life.
tracks.tag_list: Thomas Vent AMB Opiuo Kill Paris Koan Sound K+lab Stickybuds Dubstep Beat Fatigue glitchhop glitch hop glitchfunk midtempo heavy griz pretty lights idm edm gramatik

tracks.title: Warpboiz ft. Warp 9 (Out Now)
tracks.description:
As we achieve warp speed we hit time dilation and the journey turns psychomimetic. When we discussed the direction of this track with our collaborator(the excellent) Warp9 the concept for the ep hadn't evolved beyond a yin and yang idea. Luckily, Adam's music all sounds like it's beamed directly from a far distant world so we weren't surprised when we got the final draft back how well it worked. It fit perfectly into the eternal universe spacetime odyssey final concept. We think of the outro horns on Warpboiz as the warning that the ride is about to get bumpy.

tracks.title: Cheshire - Smokey Joe's (Beat Fatigue Remix)
tracks.description:
Like the track? Click the [Repost] ↻ button!

Out March 9th

● Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Beat-Fatigue/603641212989426
● SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/beat-fatigue
● Twitter: https://twitter.com/BeatFatigue1

Follow Adapted Records
● Facebook: http://facebook.com/Adaptedrecords
● SoundCloud: http://soundcloud.com/adapted-records
● Twitter: http://twitter.com/adapted_records
● Website: http://adaptedrecords.com
● Youtube: http://goo.gl/p46EN1

Cheshire Music's rise to prominence in 2015 only validates the hype from his "Funk On" and "Simply Lifted" EP's. There's no better tribute to celebrate his library and style than this eclectic 13-track compilation of remixes from his peers.

With a midtempo origin, there was plenty of room to improvise and each artist delivers a unique imprint. FarfetchD shines with one of his grittiest tunes ever, a magnificent rendition of "We'll Be There." Functionality goes awry with the bassy wobbles of Beat Fatigue, Staunch, Orphic, SpekrFreks, and SugarBeats. Accordingly, there is plenty of emerging talent on deck to put a churn in your stomach with face-melting edits from Minoru, Funkanomics, mat tha hat, DJ Wood, Squelch Music, One Hand Clap, and Synergy Sound.

tracks.description:
● Available to buy here: Beatport » http://btprt.dj/1Ovl6OX, Bandcamp » http://bit.ly/1a8iOWw, iTunes » http://apple.co/1NC7ynZ, Addictech » http://bit.ly/1E7V1xp, Spotify » http://bit.ly/1WCWDun

● Glitch Hop Community is glad to provide a platform for Sugarpunch to release their debut EP. The group consists of two Hungarian producers, Mongoose & Ivan Beres and a vocalist Wyllywyll (US).
Their first EP ‘I Wonder / Scenic Route’ includes 2 original tracks and instrumental versions too. The tunes bring forth much fun and positivity, real spring vibes, glitch hop merged with some jazz and a pinch of pop kicked up with hip hop vocals so the carefree fun is guaranteed while listening to this one.
The song ‘I Wonder’ is coming with a music video so be on the look out!
This EP is sweet like sugar but still can hit you like a punch!

tracks.title: K+lab, Stickybuds - Super Gravy ft Laughton Kora & Bailey Wiley
tracks.description:
Gramatik & Lowtemp present:

Super Gravy.

Official Music video here> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=An83j85rZSc&feature=youtu.be

Two heavyweights of the glitch hop scene, K+Lab and Stickybuds, join forces for a funk-filled release on Gramatik’s independent label Lowtemp. Featuring guest vocals from Laughton Kora and Bailey Wiley, the track they’ve cooked up is hotter than a fistful of chilies. With its irresistible horn hooks, banging drums and heavy bass, “Super Gravy” is a summer anthem in the making and everything one would expect from two top notch producers at the top of their game.

Westwood is proud to present "Delights" - The new album from Canadian electronic producer, Defunk. With a constantly evolving taste for bass music, Delights pushes his sound into new territories as he combines his favorite elements of midtempo, glitch, and future bass music with old school funk, soul, and hiphop. Westwood is proud to present "Delights" - The new album from Canadian electronic producer, Defunk. With a constantly evolving taste for bass music, Delights pushes his sound into new territories as he combines his favorite elements of midtempo, glitch, and future bass music with old school funk, soul, and hiphop. The result is a sexy palette of funky rhythms, dirty drops, jazzy solos, and special guest appearances from featured vocalists and instrumentalists alike including the Ragga Twins, Sam Klass, Marshall McGee, the Raya Brass Band and more.

tracks.title: CloZee - Revolution
tracks.description:
Donate and Download: http://music.gravitasrecordings.com/album/revolution

French producer Chloe Herry, better known by her stage name CloZee, has spent the better part of the last year on tour between North America and Europe. “Revolution”, her latest pay-what-you-want offering on the Gravitas Music imprint, could be seen as a reflection of those journeys. In some moments, the listener may find themselves deep in a lush forest surrounded by towering trees. Just the next minute, the surroundings morph into an underground venue among sweaty bodies all pulsating to the same beat. The true beauty of CloZee’s music can be found in this subdued yet intricate sophistication; the juxtaposition of elegance and detail create subtle contrast which can be seen swirling together upon observation of any of these five songs. 

Her graceful entrance begins with “Anticlimax”, a well named tune that focuses more on the evolving groove and tender melodies than any pronounced drop. The title track cleverly utilizes glitchy percussion to offset the orchestral and middle eastern harmonies. “Sankar’s Lake” gets the body moving with a catchy rhythm and flow, intelligently using bass to keep the pace progressing. Resolving on a haunting tone, “The Path To Heaven” again places focus on the delicate yet impactful drum work, culminating in a perfect conclusion for the album.

Follow CloZee:
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/clozee
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CloZee
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CloZeeMusic
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/boulet008

Follow Gravitas Recordings:
Website: http://gravitasrecordings.com/
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/gravitas-recordings
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gravitasrecordings
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gravitasmusic
Instagram: https://instagram.com/gravitasrecordings

tracks.description:
Download Δ Remixes Vol I Δ :
atyya.bandcamp.com/album/remixes-vol-i

Δ Remixes Vol I Δ contains compositions from a variety of the West Coast's most cutting edge bass music producers, ranging from established veterans to the freshest up-and-coming production talent. The roster features Desert Dwellers, Kaminanda, DRRTYWULVZ, Halfred, Hakuu, Cualli, Moon Frog, Nicefingers, Duffrey, & Soulular, the combination of which results in a sonic cauldron of psydub, ambient & downtempo, and even sprinklings of house. Each original AtYyA track has been lovingly reworked by this cast of characters, and we could not be more pleased with the result!

Thank you to all the contributors for your months of effort!

tracks.title: G-Eazy - Me Myself & I (HYTYD Remix)
tracks.description:
So so much to love about the Summer. Weather, festivals, clothes, general vibes, and of course the soul that makes all that go ’round: the music. Summer tunes are so fittingly warm and airy, and there’s few people out there that do them as well as HYTYD. His remix of James Bay’s “Let it Go” more than impressed us with its tasteful simplicity and grounded emotions, this time he’s in our spotlight thanks to a beach ready remix of G-Eazy’s radio hit, “Me Myself & I.” Beachside, poolside, in the car, in your room, in the office…I don’t care where you listen to it, this is bound to get you moving. Once again, his instrumental arrangement is clean and concise, and his vocal edits are sublime. While tropical house tends to bludgeon you over the head with the idea that it’s meant for the Summer, HYTYD’s light and lofty style implies it with the utmost maturity, leaving you to imagine it in any setting; we’re hoping to hear this baby all season long, and you make it a reality with the free download below. Enjoy.
- @EDMTUNES

HYTYD:
https://www.instagram.com/HYTYDmusic
https://www.twitter.com/HYTYDmusic
https://www.facebook.com/HYTYD
https://www.vine.co/HYTYD
https://www.youtube.com/HYTYDmusic

tracks.title: Au5 - Return To Moonland
tracks.description:
Moonland is representative of an eternal place. The infinitely cyclic nature of the moon reflects the flow of emotion and the dynamic of the life cycle. 

Return to Moonland is about revisiting a familiar place once lost or forgotten, perhaps where we came from. Upon the return, a new perspective is realized. We leave home, have new experiences, and through that process gain a new appreciation and understanding of ourselves, our origin, and our destiny.

tracks.title: I Dropped It (Halfred & Enzalla Remix)
tracks.description:
The Great Mystery Remixes Part 2 ::: https://desertdwellersmusic.bandcamp.com/album/the-great-mystery-remixes-part-2 

Earlier this year Desert Dwellers released their most diverse album in the duo's long career. The Great Mystery was the first full length collaborative project just between the main founders Amani Friend and Treavor Moontribe, and featured a wide range of styles and aesthetics from downtempo and psychedelic dub to tribal trance to exotic house and techno flavors.

To celebrate the special release, Desert Dwellers have curated an ambitious two-part remix album with a total of 25 contributions from some of the brightest luminaries and rising talents across the underground electronic music landscape. The Great Mystery Remixes Part 2 is slated for a November 1st release on the DD Bandcamp page, and features sonic reinterpretations from Emancipator, Aligning Minds, Mumukshu, Sixis, David Starfire, Whitebear, Erothyme, Mystral, Master Minded, Halfred & Enzalla, Lulacruza, Bumble, Soohan, and Supersyllius. With artists from across the globe and musical genres, these carefully crafting renditions of Desert Dwellers' The Great Mystery are a potent combination of immersive soundscapes that pay a loving tribute to the original compositions.

The Great Mystery Remixes Part 2 ::: https://desertdwellersmusic.bandcamp.com/album/the-great-mystery-remixes-part-2

tracks.title: DJ Cotts - Hardcore Ch00nage Vol.5 (2006)
tracks.description:
Another week another installment of Hardcore Ch00nage! below is a letter I sent out when I posted this promo CD to people back in 2006 including a tracklist. Hope you enjoy!
==========================================
Well guys,

It’s that time again!!!!

Another few months = Another Instalment of Hardcore Ch00nage.

I know I say this every single time but this volume (5) is the best volume to date. I keep surprising myself and im learning constantly new tricks and ways to make the mixes better. 

Thanks again to everyone that is a member and continues to listen in from Ahn.fm. I really love you guys there and it makes doing this fun and worthwhile. Without you guys being there and listening in to our small shows I don’t think I would still be doing it now. 
I guess sending out these cd’s is somewhat of a thankyou for sticking around and showing support for a long time. (This year and a half has gone damn quick).

Anyway this cd is pretty much a Raver Baby compilation. It showcases the new stuff mostly from the raver baby side of things, and I know that will make most of you out there happy to hear that! I have listened to it about 15 times over and im really pleased with how it turned out, so I hope you guys will to. 

Keep an eye on your mailboxes for Hardcore Ch00nage Vol.6 I am most of the way through it already believe it or not, and it should be coming your guy’s way soon.  Also I would always like to hear feedback from you guys and how to make future cd’s even better.

Thanks for everything,

Enjoy the cd.

Cheers,

Cotts.


Tracklisting:

1. Styles and Breeze - NYE Intro
2. Access 3 - Promised Land (Squad-e remix)
3. Euphoria - Playing Games

tracks.title: Cotts & Ravine - Live @ Mystic Playground 2015, Brisbane Australia
tracks.description:
Hi Everyone,

This set was a live recording (straight from decks, no mc)of a gig Ravine and I played at Mystic Playground on the 26th July 2015 in Brisbane, Australia. 

It's a typical Cotts & Ravine hardcore set, with lots of quick mixing and hands up hardcore. I was really happy with it and I hope you enjoy listening!

Cheers,

Cotts

tracks.title: NEST HQ MiniMix: Shawn Wasabi
tracks.description:
Spending hours, days, months, etc., crafting a collage of samples into a cohesive piece of new music is awesome art, and one Shawn Wasabi (@sssshawnnnn) is quickly becoming a master at. Aside from creating new melodic themes from found fragments of hundreds of different songs, he also performs and records each work live. You may have seen one of Shawn’s many multi-million breaking Youtube videos, but not many know these are each performed in one take. The kid’s a legend, and he’s one of the first to be pushing a cute, bubbly and hyper sound to a bigger audience in the states. We’re stoked to be sharing Shawn’s NEST HQ MiniMix with y’all today.

Follow Shawn Wasabi: 
@sssshawnnnn
https://twitter.com/shawnwasabi
https://www.facebook.com/ShawnWasabi

tracks.title: Whatcha Gonna Do (The Funk Hunters Remix)
tracks.description:
"Whatcha Gonna Do (The Funk Hunters Remix)"
by Fort Knox Five ft. Mustafa Akbar
FKX088 - Fort Knox Recordings
http://www.fortknoxfive.com

Buy it here:
https://fortknox.bandcamp.com/album/whatcha-gonna-do-ft-mustafa-akbar
http://www.junodownload.com/products/fort-knox-five-mustafa-whatcha-gonna-do/2950296-02/
https://pro.beatport.com/release/whatcha-gonna-do/1644999
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/whatcha-gonna-do-ep/id1056560465


Tracklisting:
1. Whatcha Gonna Do (The Funk Hunters Remix)
2. Whatcha Gonna Do (Father Funk Remix)
3. Whatcha Gonna Do (Original Mix)
4. Whatcha Gonna Do (The Funk Hunters Remix Instrumental)
5. Whatcha Gonna Do (Father Funk Remix Instrumental)
6. Whatcha Gonna Do (Instrumental Mix)

Fort Knox Five is proud to present their latest single, “Whatcha Gonna Do” featuring Mustafa Akbar with killer remixes by The Funk Hunters and Father Funk.  

Fort Knox Five’s longtime friends and brothers in funk, Vancouver-based The Funk Hunters have delivered one of the baddest floor-rocking remixes ever!  This track debuted in the Fractal Forest at the 2015 Shambhala Music Festival where it electrified the masses and brought the crowd to a fever pitch. The Funk Hunters have injected their signature sound into “Whatcha Gonna Do” with big drops, huge hooks, and enough glitch and disco to make you put your hands up!  This is a guaranteed banger full of West Coast synths and chunked out beats. Easy to see why this one is already a staple of The Funk Hunters amazing live sets.

The next “Whatcha Gonna Do” Remix is by Father Funk, the Leeds, UK based producer known for his clever remixes and smashing edits.  Father Funk’s remix begins with Rob Myers’ retro wah-wah guitar and Mustafa Akbar’s soulful party chants then quickly escalates into a wobbly, bass heavy, butt-shaking glitch-hop monster! Hold on tight as Father Funk breaks it down, takes it back to the original soul vibe and then finishes strong with a deep groove.

The original mix of “Whatcha Gonna Do” featuring Mustafa Akbar is a quintessential Fort Knox Five slice of retro disco funk – straight from the ’70s – infused with tight, electronic production. With its live horns, funky guitar riffs and Mustafa Akbar’s soulful hooks, Fort Knox Five has created an irresistible party anthem. DJs and radio stations alike have rallied behind “Whatcha Gonna Do”, making it one of the lead tracks from Fort Knox Five’s 2015 album Pressurize The Cabin.
tracks.tag_list: Funk Bass Glitch Remix "The Funk Hunters" "Fort Knox Five" "Mustafa Akbar"

tracks.title: Can't Hold Me Down (ft. Tash Neal of The London Souls)
tracks.description:
Pre-Order my new album, Good Will Prevail:  iTunes - http://geni.us/GWPitunes

Politics, the news, senseless deaths... got me feelin' pretty helpless recently. I wrote Can't Hold Me Down as a piece of motivation for those who are feelin' down and struggling in their lives. 

I saw a live performance video of Tash Neal (from The London Souls) playing and knew instantly we had to work together. I wrote the demo and sent it his way. What I got back was magic. Tash is perfect on this tune. 

Don't curse the darkness, be a light. Be the force that pushes others to keep their heads high and stay inspired. Stand up for what you believe in at all costs. Never give up on people.

iTunes - http://geni.us/CHMDitunes
Spotify - http://geni.us/CHMDspotify

tracks.title: Illenium - I'll Be Your Reason [NEST052]
tracks.description:
“Skrillex founded Nest to shine a light on untapped talent -- and San Francisco native https://soundcloud.com/illeniumofficial fits the bill.” – Billboard

Denver-based producer Illenium (aka Nicholas Miller) has linked up with NEST for the release of his latest single, “I’ll Be Your Reason”, out today, June 8th. Falling somewhere in the vast realm of future bass, the new single sees Miller harness his superlative ability for melodic production, utilizing hazy vocals from Irish songwriter, EDEN, for a moody, downtempo jam.

“I wanted to surprise people with this tune and show that music can both be beautiful, complex, and diverse all at the same time,” Miller explains. Complete with fluid textures and incisive hip hop percussion, Illenium creates a gratifying juxtaposition of floaty atmospherics and assertive, bass-heavy hits that highlights the rising producer’s multifaceted approach to his craft.

Illenium on:
https://soundcloud.com/illeniumofficial
http://www.facebook.com/illenium
https://twitter.com/ILLENIUMMUSIC

tracks.title: Singularity - Lael Bellotti, Dave Cortex, Melanie Synn, Harnois
tracks.description:
singularity
noun

    1. the state, fact, quality, or condition of being singular
        "he believed in the singularity of all cultures"

    2. PHYSICS | MATHEMATICS
        a point at which a function takes an infinite value, especially in space-time when matter is infinitely dense, as at the center of a black hole.

--- Four years ago, four aspiring musicians from four corners of America's east coast found themselves each at a crossroads, with a desire to go against the grain. After a chance meeting, a bold experiment was undertaken: to create a functional environment dedicated to nurturing creativity and production. Pursuing parallel endeavors, but helping each other along the way, the four joined forces. Singularity is the culmination of their paths becoming one. ---

    The Party:

    DC industry veteran Dave Cortex (INSOMNIFIED, Hotfingers, Funkedge) has DJ'd in the nation's capital and beyond for 15 years now. Wearing many hats over his career, Dave has found success as an event promoter, music journalist, web & media designer, and his most recognizable role: producing a decade's worth of funky, groove-centric, genre-defying house music.

    Virginia native Lael Bellotti (INSOMNIFIED, Neuroscience, Kaywood) holds a degree in mechanical engineering, but set his sights on engineering of a different sort. Becoming the protégé of studio whiz Dave Cortex, he began learning the art of music production. Lael's meticulous attention to detail came in handy in the studio, and it wasn't long before cranking out big room bangers was second nature.

    A rare breed of musician with both vocal quality and pro studio chops, Baltimore-born-and-raised Melanie Synn (INSOMNIFIED, Funkedge, Hotfingers) spent her formative years performing in theater before discovering the DC rave scene. Melanie's expressive and sultry underground sound transcends genres, and her unique ability to create infectious hooks and harmonies with both the vox and DAW is second to none.

    Josh Harnois (INSOMNIFIED, Silk Royal Records, Funkedge) has taken DC by storm with a genre-defying style that fuses electronic music with classical and jazz elements. Bringing together his impressive skills on a variety of live instruments (keyboard, sax, guitar) with serious studio skills, Harnois creates raw, lush, & sexy sounds in a fusion of harmony, melody, and technology.


--- Collectively, their work has been supported by industry heavyweights including David Guetta, Paul Oakenfold, Myon and Shane 54, Dirty Vegas, Tritonal, and Michael Woods; they've remixed Lazy Rich, Magnetie, Hirshee, Max Vangeli, and Swanky Tunes; and performed alongside Kaskade, BT, Josh Wink, DJ Dan, and Nick Warren; to name a few.  Together, this is their Singularity. ---

- BEATPORT EXCLUSIVE: RELEASING OCTOBER 27
Follow Insomnified Music:
www.facebook.com/INSOMNIFIEDMUSIC
www.twitter.com/INSOMNIFIED247
www.youtube.com/user/Insomnified
SC: @insomnifiedmusic

Follow Lael Bellotti
twitter.com/LaelBellotti
www.facebook.com/Laelbellottimusic
SC: @lael-bellotti

About: Klaypex is an electronic trio based in Los Angeles consisting of Johnny Atar, Alan Notkin and Mark Emmanuel that produces variations of house, electro and future funk, a new genre combining 80's funk with elements of future music and electro house.

In the past Klaypex has collaborated with acts such as Epic Meal Time, Corridor Digital ("DUBSTEP GUNS"), Mike Diva and many other successful creators. They've also worked with international superstar Gerardo Ortiz and have collaborated with many other musicians throughout their career.

tracks.title: One And Only
tracks.description:
Out now :') DJ's get the MP3 here : http://apple.co/1O3zsFU
_____________________________________
Send me <3 on Hype Machine (◡‿◡✿): 
http://hypem.com/track/2c8f2/Sable.+-+One+And+Only

@thatsableguy
www.facebook.com/thatsableguy
Stream on Apple Music : itun.es/au/XKVq8
Stream on Spotify : spoti.fi/1Rn0o8V

"One and Only’ is a love song with a hidden meaning. Its focus is on the relationships people build online and then the feelings of attachment they develop from that. It's a pop song at heart dressed in a club aesthetic" - Sable

When the infectious club bounce of Perth producer Sable’s breakthrough single 'Feels So Good' hit the airwaves over the Summer of 2014, it marked a significant shift in Australian electronic music. Marrying the jersey bounce & club crushing production chops of then break out stars like Ryan Hemsworth & Nadus, with an undeniably Australian polish & sheen. Sable spent the rest of the year on multiple country wide tours, ushering in a new era of Aussie club music that came to include the likes of Basenji & UV Boi, & set the stage for Australian radio's introduction to the hyperactive blissed out pop music of Lido, Cashmere Cat, and more.

Featuring for the first time, the voice of Sable himself, ‘One and Only’ comes filtered through androgynous larynx tones & a GPS dizzying vocal, with the 'Current Location' marker hovering over somewhere not of this earth. He once again fly’s the flag for Splendour this year, showcasing new material from the upcoming EP.  In the words of Sable himself.

Vocals by me hehe

tracks.title: Mako - Smoke Filled Room (Elephante Remix)
tracks.description:
Free Download: http://smarturl.it/SFRremixDL
Listen on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/6yRPlWxFY2gVki7BtvS1ZL

so every now and then i hear a song that hits me right in the feels, makes me feel like butterflies and sunsets and lonely bars, and this was one of them. i was simultaneously in love and also furious that I didn't write this song, so i was incredibly psyched to work on the remix - it reminded me how fun and awesome making music can be. it's one of the most emotional and moving dance tracks I've heard in awhile, so I tried to honor that and still put my own twist on it. much love to mako, those guys are brilliant, so go follow them and check them out if you haven't already. ENJOY!!!

SUPPORT THE ORIGINAL
https://soundcloud.com/wearemako/mako-smoke-filled-room

SUPPORT MAKO:
https://soundcloud.com/wearemako
https://www.facebook.com/WeAreMako

Haters, get at me: www.twitter.com/IAmTheElephante
Lovers, go LIKE my page: www.facebook.com/IAmTheElephante
www.elephantemusic.com

Whispering through the valleys
that run through our

and move generations to come

tracks.title: G-Eazy - Me Myself & I (HYTYD Remix)
tracks.description:
So so much to love about the Summer. Weather, festivals, clothes, general vibes, and of course the soul that makes all that go ’round: the music. Summer tunes are so fittingly warm and airy, and there’s few people out there that do them as well as HYTYD. His remix of James Bay’s “Let it Go” more than impressed us with its tasteful simplicity and grounded emotions, this time he’s in our spotlight thanks to a beach ready remix of G-Eazy’s radio hit, “Me Myself & I.” Beachside, poolside, in the car, in your room, in the office…I don’t care where you listen to it, this is bound to get you moving. Once again, his instrumental arrangement is clean and concise, and his vocal edits are sublime. While tropical house tends to bludgeon you over the head with the idea that it’s meant for the Summer, HYTYD’s light and lofty style implies it with the utmost maturity, leaving you to imagine it in any setting; we’re hoping to hear this baby all season long, and you make it a reality with the free download below. Enjoy.
- @EDMTUNES

HYTYD:
https://www.instagram.com/HYTYDmusic
https://www.twitter.com/HYTYDmusic
https://www.facebook.com/HYTYD
https://www.vine.co/HYTYD
https://www.youtube.com/HYTYDmusic

tracks.description:
Moonland is representative of an eternal place. The infinitely cyclic nature of the moon reflects the flow of emotion and the dynamic of the life cycle. 

Return to Moonland is about revisiting a familiar place once lost or forgotten, perhaps where we came from. Upon the return, a new perspective is realized. We leave home, have new experiences, and through that process gain a new appreciation and understanding of ourselves, our origin, and our destiny.

tracks.title: The Hex
tracks.description:
"The Hex" tells a story about the uncertainty of the future, specifically our future as a band. We came up with the name on our very first tour when we found a book about sacred geometry. All spiritual meanings aside, this track tells the story of our very first national tour from running out of gas on the side of the highway to rocking sold out shows. As we woke up everyday, we had no idea what that day had in store for us and we were living life by the moment. We truly discovered that life is about the journey, not the destination. Feeding off energy gained from the road, "The Hex" is a summary of 22,000 miles of driving across the US in a Jeep Grand Cherokee. 

Written, Composed, Mixed by Arja Adair, Luke Sims 
Mastering by Chris Cox

tracks.title: Au5 feat Q'AILA - Any Longer
tracks.description:
Au5 opens up with “Any Longer,” an earthy, atmospheric bass track that sees his production chops shine through. The song creates a foundation of delicate piano melodies and propulsive percussive rhythms, all while creating a healthy dose of explosive dubstep during the drops. Au5’s production wizardry combines soft and subtle elements along with banging growly bass, the 2 worlds combine perfectly creating a lush pallet for Q’Aila’s smoky, provocative verses and energetic, soaring choruses.


Bandcamp: http://www.hive.co/l/bcalhr
Spotify: http://www.hive.co/l/spotifyalhr
Itunes: http://www.hive.co/l/itunesalhr


http://facebook.com/theau5
http://soundcloud.com/au5
http://instagram.com/au5_official
http://twitter.com/au5music
tracks.tag_list: Bass Electronic

tracks.title: Au5 feat Q'AILA - Hit Rewind
tracks.description:
Hit Rewind is a relaxed but engaging departure from the dub-centric opener. Glistening, bubble like synths start the tune, and then it settles into a bouncing, intricate drum shuffle that drives a bright, addictive melody. All the layers and textures are all pulled together by a syncopated, buttery-smooth bass line, which expertly compliments Q‘Aila’s unapologetically sultry, soulful vocal lines.

HEY GUYS!
So grateful we found Daniel Ahearn, a Singer based in Los Angeles, who wrote this song together with Rich Jacques. We discovered this track on Youtube and really loved everything about it. The lyrics are very intense and emotional. But (and this was most important for us) absolutely authentic. 

We took the vocals and built a whole new arrangement and instrumentation around them. We think this song is brilliant for thoughtful moments, but also while just chilling with your friends enjoying good music!

Please support us by sharing this track with your friends and/or put it into your playlists. But most of all, enjoy it! :)

G&D

Lyrics:
There’s a gentleness I’ve known,
Knew it best when it was fading,
Trying to find my way back home,
Don’t you know, there’s no escaping.

Because I wanted to be loved,
I just wanted to get close to you,
Because I wanted to be loved,
I lost everything I knew.

Turned away from all my dreams,
broken down disintegrating,
Ignored the signs of all deceit,
couldn’t believe - can you blame me?

Because I wanted to be loved,
I just wanted to get close to you,
Because I wanted to be loved,
I lost everything I knew.

Didn’t see until it all was done,
Felt so right to hold someone,
what i saw in you was almost true,
brutal what the heart will do…

Because I wanted to be loved,
I just wanted to get close to you,
Because I wanted to be loved,
I lost everything I knew.

tracks.title: Frank Walker - Run With The Real Feat. DAVS (Original Mix)
tracks.description:
Run With The Real.

Hot off of the success of his most recent single, ‘Toes’, Frank Walker is back with another massive summer release.  Frank’s latest release, ‘Run With The Real’, features the amazing vocals of LA-based artist DAVS.  With this latest single, Walker is taking a departure from his traditional house style, experimenting with down-tempo vibes, and crafting a new frontier for his sound. 

‘Run with The Real’ is a grouping of sensual and uplifting melodies that will be hitting the dance floor at the peak of summer.  DAVS has delivered a masterful vocal performance, mixing her sweet vocal performance with edgy lyrics that are sure to turn heads. After listening to such an intoxicating combination, all can agree that with Walker’s powerful production, alongside the amazing vocals of DAVS, ‘Run with The Real’ is guaranteed to be a summer hit.

Follow Frank Walker to stay up to date on future releases:

@frankwalkerofficial
www.facebook.com/DJFrankWalker
www.twitter.com/DJFrankWalker

tracks.description:
With the release of his Free EP, Sanktum is establishing himself as a star on the rise. “Cobalt”, which features trancey and ambient dynamics, transforms into an electro blippy and grungy drop. The ability to infuse two different genres creates a harmonious sound that is like no other and shows why he will become a master at his craft.
